interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Argan Magic 100% Pure Argan Oil – Moisturizing Oil that Infuses Skin with Enriched Hydration | Leaves Skin Restored & Refreshed | Non-Greasy | Rich in Vitamin E | Made in USA | Cruelty Free (2 oz) Review Date: 2020/08/17 Store: Argan Magic Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Argan Magic', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Active Ingredients': 'Vitamin e', 'Unit Count': '2 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.2 x 1.1 x 1.1 inches; 2 Ounces', 'UPC': '605923474046'} Review Text: believe it or not, i love this. i know most of the reviews are complaining about the smell. if you are a purist and are sensitive to fragrances, you will love this. i have allergic rhinitis that gets triggered by scented stuff and my husband gets a headache and it is so hard to find unscented/fragrance free hair products. glad i found this.

my husband bought me argan oil without fragrance but it was super heavy, thick and sticky. this one is super lightweight. when first applied, my hair looks oily but it goes away, it just keeps my hair soft. i have very frizzy hair and dry -- not damaged, it's just the texture of my hair, and i love this. Review Title: it is pure -- no added scents. Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
BYS Kabuki Brush BYS {'Brand': 'BYS', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Ferrule Material': 'Aluminum', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '0.04 x 0.02 x 0.02 inches', 'Item Weight': '36 Grams', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.04 x 0.02 x 0.02 inches; 1.27 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'BC/BYNKBS', 'Manufacturer': 'BYS'} It's smaller than expected. I thought it would be bigger because of the price. Is is a very soft brush and good for blending powder and buffing because it's not scratchy, I hate scratchy brushes. It's good to travel with. It also sheds a little bit at first washing. Is is a very soft brush and good for blending powder and buffing because it's not scratchy Mountain Falls Regular Dip-It Nail Polish Remover for Natural Nails, with Vitamin E and Panthenol, 9 Fluid Ounce Mountain Falls {'Brand': 'Mountain Falls', 'Item Weight': '0.5 Pounds', 'Unit Count': '9 Fl Oz'} i love the convenience and ease of use. just dip your finger in the hole and it erases the polish like it never happened. it is potent stuff. it's basically just remover with a foam soaked inside with a bunch of incisions that you can insert your nails in. no complaints except that you will taste the fume (bitter) when you first open it. just keep it away from nose. easy to use and effective JPNK 4PCS Anti-Static Detangling Fine & Wide Tooth Shower Comb Set JPNK {'Material': 'Plastic', 'Brand': 'JPNK', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy,Straight', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '12 x 3.1 x 0.7 inches; 5.61 Ounces'} love love love!

i love how they look. you get a wide tooth and fine tooth, and most of all they are aesthetically pleasing. no tugging, they are not sharp, they don't hurt the scalp. i do recommend. pretty, great value! a lot of combs! 12ML Refillable Perfume Atomizer Bottle for Travel Spray Scent Pump Case Pack of 5 Rioa {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.71 x 0.71 x 4.13 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Surface Matalic Bottle', 'UPC': '753940391508'} [[VIDEOID:a3d7f3db939833c254ff74281c0dde18]] with the corona virus thing, i ordered this to fill with alcohol instead. i carry one in all my coat pockets and pocketbooks, so that i can spray my hands. the size is just right. you can't use up a whole thing of alcohol if went out in public. impressed with how pretty they are too. they are easy to figure out. the colors are just jackets -- you pull off the cap and the bottom so that you can unscrew the sprayer and fill it up. very good sprayer as well. not mad. i am happy. this came in handy Lesentia Tinted Moisturizer with SPF 31 – Tinted Moisturizer For Face With Spf and Blemish Concealer with All Natural Ingredients like Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil, Vitamin E and Zinc* (Medium - 2fl oz) L'esentia {'Brand': "L'esentia", 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Active Ingredients': 'jojoba,vitamin e,zinc', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '6.77 x 2.32 x 2.24 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'UPC': '850016254009'} i wanted to like this but i can't. it has coverage like a light coverage foundation but too dark in color, if you are very tan yes the color would work. i can't believe this is a "moisturizer" because it is super thick and sticky, it feels so heavy on the skin, it doesn't set or feel dry after unless you powder it. i can work with the color, i just don't like how this feels, your skin will feel warm and sticky. it's a shame because there is a lot in the bottle. if you want this for the coverage, might as well buy a bottle of foundation. this feels sooo heavy! Eyebrow Stencil ,Eyebrows Grooming Stencil Kit Reusable Styling Tool with 1 Eyebrow Pencil (8pcs Gray Eyebrow stencils（new style）) VANGAY {'Brand': 'VANGAY', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Special Feature': 'Reusable', 'Material Feature': 'Reusable, Natural', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '8.8 x 6.3 x 0.9 inches; 2.4 Ounces'} when i first saw these i didn't have much faith. i have bought something like this before that was a waste of money, i hated it so much i got mad -- even though i only paid less than 5 dollrs.

this is pretty cool, depending on your preferred shape, you can choose from the stencils they have and load it up to the holder. the stencils are not super stiff, they have some give so you can push them hard against your forehead.

this helped me a lot. i have very uneven eyebrows, they take me almost 30 minutes to do just trying to make them look like they are on the same level, one is at the basement and the other one is on the 3rd floor.

i don't use this to stencil my whole entire eyebrows, i use this to guide the top and the beginning of my eyebrows because that is where my struggle is and i freestyle the rest. and it has helped me alot. although it's not perfect, there could be improvements, it is still very useful.

it comes with a razor even so you can shape your brows.

the stencils were a little confusing at first, but to help you: I use E1 and E2. they are alphabetical and the pair should match in the letters but would be 1 & 2.

the elastic that came with it, supposedly to hold the stencil in place just broke right away, did not even start using it yet, but i don't think it's necessary.

hope this helps you. great tool for uneven eyebrows Argan Magic 100% Pure Argan Oil – Moisturizing Oil that Infuses Skin with Enriched Hydration | Leaves Skin Restored & Refreshed | Non-Greasy | Rich in Vitamin E | Made in USA | Cruelty Free (2 oz) Argan Magic {'Brand': 'Argan Magic', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Active Ingredients': 'Vitamin e', 'Unit Count': '2 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.2 x 1.1 x 1.1 inches; 2 Ounces', 'UPC': '605923474046'} believe it or not, i love this. i know most of the reviews are complaining about the smell. if you are a purist and are sensitive to fragrances, you will love this. i have allergic rhinitis that gets triggered by scented stuff and my husband gets a headache and it is so hard to find unscented/fragrance free hair products. glad i found this.

my husband bought me argan oil without fragrance but it was super heavy, thick and sticky. this one is super lightweight. when first applied, my hair looks oily but it goes away, it just keeps my hair soft. i have very frizzy hair and dry -- not damaged, it's just the texture of my hair, and i love this. it is pure -- no added scents.
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user remains dedicated to soft, quality beauty brushes and tools that marry functionality with aesthetic appeal. Their recent purchase of a lightweight argan oil shows an appreciation for nourishing, effective solutions that cater to specific beauty needs, reflecting their ongoing adaptability.

- **Travel-Friendly:** Compact and transportable beauty tools continue to be a priority for the user. They seek practical solutions that seamlessly fit into their beauty regimen, reinforcing their preference for items that enhance their routine without taking up too much space.

- **Expectation vs. Reality:** The user maintains high standards for product quality and performance, demonstrated by their willingness to critique products and share feedback. Their positive review of the oil highlights a nuanced understanding of the importance of lightweight, effective formulations that meet their sensitivities.

- **Quality Concerns:** Durability and effective performance remain key values for the user, with a clear preference for products that provide ease of use. Their evaluations indicate a balanced approach, recognizing both strengths and areas for improvement in beauty tools and treatments.

- **Overall Satisfaction:** Recent interactions highlight the user’s sensitivity to usability and effectiveness, emphasizing a desire for products that not only look good but also enhance the overall application experience. They continue to seek out solutions that address specific needs, such as controlling frizz, while ensuring comfort and ease in their beauty routine.
